title: praNamAmyaham shrI
sahitya:
praNamAmyaham shrI pankEruhAsAm pancAnanAdi sarvadEva bhAvitAm


anupallavi

  praNavArti pradarshanIm praNatArtti pracamanIm 
para sukha dAyinIm vara kavinuta caraNAm vAgadIshvarIm


caraNam    virinci vanitAm vimalAm muraLIgAna-muditAm vara kaccappirava 
niratAm pustaka sukha sarasijAkSa mAlAdi dhrtAm satatam
